alert.note: Alert for Cowley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 28 at 12:23AM CDT until June 28 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR COWLEY COUNTY... At 1221 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles east of Latham to near Moline to 7 miles southeast of Cedar Vale, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Arkansas City, Winfield, Burden, Dexter, Atlanta, Rock, Cambridge, Maple City, Winfield City Lake and Strother Field Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
